msg_save_error: Encountered fatal errors while saving to json
msg_access_error: Couldn't access the output file. Check the permissons on it.
msg_load_error: Encountered fatal errors while loading json
msg_config_corrupt: Config file is missing elements array. Possible corrupt file?
label_help_about:
input-overlay config creation tool
  licensed under the GNU General Public License 2.0
  github.com/univrsal/input-overlay

Thanks to:
  The OBS Studio team and contributers
  obsproject.com
  The SDL developers (also SDL_image and SDL_ttf)
  libsdl.org
  Translators: Kuer hyrious

Usage:
  Scroll wheel: Zoom in/out
  Left mouse: move elements
  Right mouse: move preview
  Ctrl: Make unselected elements transparent

  Some keys will work within the preview
  and light up when pressed
label_info: You can drag and drop files onto the textboxes
label_texture_path: Enter the path to the texture file:
label_config_path: Enter config path for saving or loading:
label_wheel_info:
Select only the default texture
Next to it in order:

 Scrolling up
 Scrolling down

Player 1 lit up

The stick centered
